page.title: 01Buerton
page.content: Buerton is a sparsely populated sleepy village situated on the Cheshire/ Shropshire/Staffordshire borders. It is a flat grassland area, the greenery occasionally broken with the 20 farms & the residential area of the village. An intensive dairying area with the main accent on milk production but some farms are rearing calves, beef cattle & sheep. The majority of residents are self employed but professional people have settled & they commute to the surrounding Cheshire & pottery towns. A new housing development at Windmill Green is in progress with no public trans- port to speak of, the majority of families are car owners. The nearest post offices & shops are in the neighbouring villages of Woore & Audlem.
